briefTitle: The Evaluation of the Safety of a New Drug for Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia Used for 9 Months

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Males in good general health and at least 50 years of age, who have completed SI04009 or SI04010.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Medical conditions that would confound the efficacy evaluation.
* Medical conditions in which it would be unsafe to use an alpha-blocker.
* The use of concomitant drugs that would confound the efficacy evaluation.
* The use of concomitant drugs that would be unsafe with this alpha-blocker.

outcomeMeasures.title: Adverse Events
outcomeMeasures.description: All reported adverse events were recorded. Clinically significant abnormal laboratory values or other clinical findings upon examination were also recorded as adverse events.

outcomeMeasures.title: International Prostate Symptom Score (IPSS)
outcomeMeasures.description: The IPSS is a symptom severity scale from 0 to 35 that is derived from a 7 item questionnaire. 0 indicates no symptoms and 35 indicates most severe symptoms.
